name: Feasting Flowers
description:
- ABOUT -

Feasting Flowers was made for Trijam 187. This was made across 3 hours for the theme "stay here forever".

This is a really quick game where you have to protect your flowers from incoming "feasting flowers" and water them so they don't die

- CONTROLS -

Use LEFT MOUSE CLICK to kill a monster.

In order to pick up water, HOVER MOUSE OVER WELL and click LEFT MOUSE BUTTON.

HOLD LEFT MOUSE BUTTON and HOVER OVER FLOWERS to water them.

- CREDITS -
